meanings.sent1: They are copresenting the project at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The team is copresenting their findings to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The copresenting duo kept the audience engaged throughout the presentation.
meanings.sent4: Their copresenting style seamlessly blended their individual strengths.
meanings.sent5: Copresenting allows for a dynamic and interactive presentation experience.

meanings.definition: The act of jointly presenting information or material.
meanings.sent1: The copresenting of the report was well-received by the committee.
meanings.sent2: Collaboration in copresenting enhances the overall impact of the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The copresenting of the data made the audience both informed and entertained.
meanings.sent4: Their copresenting was like a synchronized dance of information.
meanings.sent5: The copresenting partnership brought a fresh perspective to the topic.
